name: The Greatest Snowball
description:
The Greatest Snowball

In the end, the greatest snowball isn't a snowball at all...it's fear. Merry Christmas.

- Dwight

The Greatest Snowball is an action game for the TV Show Game Jam where you have to try to kill as many Dwight Snowmen as possible. Don't spill the chili!

How to Play
  • Move around with WASD
  • Click to attack
  • Sprint with shift
Tools
  • Game Engine - Unity
  • Art - Krita
  • Music - Antti Luode
